participant_abstract.sent: The meeting went well, all of the participants were introduced and roles described.
We discussed how the produced should look feel, the importance of practicicality, fashion and cost, and contrasted these thoughts to currently availble devices.
By the end of the meeting we had not made many long term descions but had several ideas about the device.
For example the device should not look as boring, should be comfortable to hold and not that the remote control could be used from lots of angles towards the television.

Ideas included interchangable differently coloured covers, the use of the device to control several devices like dvd players etc, the buttons to be illiuminated and the buttons to be concave rather than the standard convex.

participant_decisions.sent: Decisions that relate to look and functionality such as multiple devices, and interchangalble colours, and to break the trend of current remote controls.
